mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.pro_id , t1.dis_text , t1.send_to , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from dispute_memo t1
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.PRO_ID like '%'||#{bean.proId}||'%'
and t1.DIS_TEXT like '%'||#{bean.disText}||'%'
and t1.SEND_TO like '%'||#{bean.sendTo}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.pro_id , t1.dis_text , t1.send_to , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from dispute_memo t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.pro_id , t1.dis_text , t1.send_to , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 from dispute_memo t1 where t1.pro_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into dispute_memo
id,
pro_id,
dis_text,
send_to,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{disText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sendTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creationDate},
#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastUpdateDate},
#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE},
#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE},
#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update dispute_memo t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.pro_id =#{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.dis_text =#{disText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.send_to =#{sendTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

update dispute_memo t1 set t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.pro_id =#{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.dis_text =#{disText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.send_to =#{sendTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.creation_date =#{creationDate}, t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.version =t1.version+1, t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}
